snippet: The Venezuelan president sent a message on Twitter saying he was “soaring like a condor.”
lead_paragraph: The Venezuelan president sent a message on Twitter saying he was “soaring like a condor.”

headline.seo: Chávez Tells World He Is Recovering Well From Surgery
